name: The Most Dangerous (choose your own adventure) Game
name_original: The Most Dangerous (choose your own adventure) Game
description:
This game was submitted as part of the Public Domain Game Jam, and transforms portions of The Most Dangerous Game by Richard Connell into a lighthearted choose-your-own-adventure game. 

Follow in the footsteps of Sanger Rainsford as he confronts the most dangerous hunt of his life!

Created by Max Sullivan, age 12. 

Thanks!
